name: Chrono Days Sim Date
summary:
Chrono Days Sim Date is a romantic dating simulation game for girls.

Saige lives in the distant future but accidentally time travels into the distant past. Will she be able to find a way to travel back to her time or will she fall in love with someone who lives in the past?

8 dateable characters, more than 8 different endings
